Alle Einkünfte und Bezüge des Kindes sin: You must provide docouments for all income and benefits the child receives!
Alle Einnahmen aus Kapitalvermögen (z. B: Specify all income from capital assets (e.g. interest, dividends) falling due in the respective calendar year, even if it is credited in the next year. This also applies, if child benefit is only paid for a part of the year, of if the income falls due only after you stop receiving child benefit. As supporting documents for the income, provide bank confirmations, account statements, etc.
Als Nachweis ist der Bewilligungsbeschei: As supporting documents, provide the approval notice, a confirmation about the period and amount of the benefit or similar proof. The Family Benefits Office reduces other income (e.g. pensions from public pensions funds) by the standard work-related tax deduction of EUR 102.
Anzugeben sind alle Leistungen, die das: Specify all benefits the child receives from a National Employment Agency, such as vocational training allowance, apprenticeship subsidy, child support, transition payments, unemployment benefits, etc.

Specify all benefits the child receives from an authority other than the National Employment Agency, such as national student and apprentice loans (BaföG) or scholarships funded by private individuals or foundations. As proof, provide the official approval notice, a confirmation about the duration and amount of the benefit or a similar document.
Anzugeben sind andere Einnahmen des Kind: Specify all of the child's income, such as pensions from public funds (pensions for disability or for (half) orphans, etc.), sick pay, parental benefit, long-term unemployment benefits (ALG II), welfare payments, housing allowance, pensions from the public accident insurance, veteran's pensions, income from au pair work abroad, cash and material benefits for recruits and conscientous objectors, including Christmas and discharge payments.
Anzugeben sind ggf. erhöhte Werbungskost: If applicable, state increased costs of finding work (in this case, the Family Benefits Office will send you a special form), special costs of training, etc. Special costs of training comprises the actual expenses for training, e.g. travel costs to university, tuition fees, material, etc.
Anzugeben sind nur die seit dem Tag der: State the net income since the first day of marriage / registration of the civil partnership. As proof, provide the documents named under No. 1 - 5. If benefits under No. 3 - 5 were claimed for the spouse/partner of the child, and if the claim is still pending, specify this under No. 8.
Beachten Sie bitte die beiliegenden Hinw: Please observe the attached comments on completing the statement template and required proofs.
Die Betriebsausgaben bzw. Werbungskosten: The business expenses / costs of finding work must be stated in the documents or specified under No. 8. For income from capital assets before the 2008 calendar year, the Family Benefits Office deducts the work-related tax deduction allowance (EUR 51; EUR 102 for married couples) and after the 2009 calendar year, the savings allowance (EUR 801; EUR 1602 for married couples).
Die Einnahmen aus nichtselbständiger Arb: Income from wage labor must be proven by offical pay slips / wage statements or by employer confirmation. The proofs must state the gross wage plus material benefits (e.g., board and lodging), bonuses and one-time payments, such as holiday pay, Christmas bonus, gratifications and other benefits received from the employer. As proof for pensions and related benefits, provide the official approval or proof of the duration and amount of the benefit.
Einnahmen aus selbständiger Arbeit, Gewe: Income from self-employment, business, agriculture and forestry or from rent and lease contracts must generally be verified by providing the latest income tax notice; you can also provide confirmations by certified tax advisors, accountants etc. as proof.
Ergänzende Angaben (z.B. zu Werbungskost: Supporting information (e.g. on work-related tax deductions, business expenses, special training costs) - provide on separate sheet if necessary:
Erhielt das Kind BAföG oder andere Studi: Did the child receive a state scholarship (BaföG) or other student or apprentice benefits/scholarships?
Erhielt das Kind Leistungen von einer Ag: Did the child receive payments from a National Employment Agency?
Erklärung zu den Einkünften und Bezügen: Declaration on the income and benefits of a child over 18 years of age for periods before 31 December 2011
Fallen Einkünfte und Bezüge in mehreren: If there is income or benefits for multiple calendar years, state and verify them separately for each calendar year.
Hatte das Kind Einnahmen aus: Did the child have income from
Hatte das Kind andere als die in den Nrn: Did the child have other income than stated under no. 1 to 4?
Hatte der Ehegatte/Lebenspartner des Kin: Does the spouse/partner of the child receive income, pensions or other benefits in the sense of No. 1 - 5?
Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Information according to the German Data Protection Act: The Data is collected, processed and used due to and for the purpose of §§ 31, 62 to 78 Einkommenssteuergesetz (Income Tax Act) and legal regulation and the Bundeskindergeldgesetz (Federal Child Benefit Act) and the Sozialgesetzbuch (Code of Social Law).
Hinweise zum Ausfüllen der Erklärung zu: Information on completing the Statement of Income for a child over 18 years for periods preceding 31 December 2011 and the required proofs
In folgenden Monaten flossen zusätzliche: Additional net income was earned in the following months (e.g. holiday pay, Christmas pay or gratifications):
Name: Surname
Name und Vorname des/der Kindergeldberec: Surname and first name of the person entitled to child allowance
Nicht anzugeben sind Unterhaltsleistunge: Support payments from parents or child benefit must not be specified.
Nur auszufüllen, wenn das Kind verheirat: Only complete if the child is married or has started a registered partnership:
Sofern sich bereits mitgeteilte und nach: If the provided information on the child's income and received benefits has not changed, please enter it again in the form, but you do not need to prove them again; just enter "bereits bekannt" (already known).
Telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Telephone number during the day in case of questions:
Versorgungsbezüge (z. B. Hinterbliebenen: State pensions (e.g. for surviving dependents of civil servants)
Wenn eine der Fragen mit „ja“ beantworte: If you answered "yes" to one of the questions:
Wir versichern, dass alle Angaben wahrhe: We hereby declare that all the information was provided truthfully. The required documents are attached. We are aware that any change concerning the given information has to be reported to the responsible Family Benefits Office.
Wurden für das Kind Leistungen im Sinne: Did someone claim benefits under no. 3 to 5 for the child and is the application still pending?
